title: Civil War Defenses of Washington: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar             Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 2 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Civil War Defenses of Washington  2016 Fort DuPont Summer concert series      Time: 6:00 PM to 9:30 PM Location: FORT DUPONT Fees: FREE     Saturday, August 20, 2016 FODU SUMMER CONCERTS View Details      Civil War Defenses of Washington  2016 NPS Founders' Day (Centenial Celebration)      Time: 10:00 AM to 1:30 PM Location: TBD Fees: free     Saturday, August 27, 2016 2016 Founders' Day View Details                          Fort Stevens 150th   7 Photos  Images from the 150th Anniversary of the Battle of Fort Stevens.          Civil War Washington   24 Photos  These photos are found in the Library of Congress. They are pictures of the soldiers and citizens in Washington area during and after the Civil War.          More Civil War Washington   35 Photos  Photographs and other information from the Library of Congress and National Archives.
